label: clinical_signal_03_dx_vaccine_immunogenicity_001
content:
## 2024-03-04 Daily Operations Summary

### Enrollment
- Total Enrolled: 45
- Active: 45
- Screen Failures Cumulative: 1
- Withdrawals Cumulative: 0

### Enrollment By Dose Group
- Low Dose: 12
- Mid Dose: 10
- High Dose: 12
- Placebo: 11

### Immunogenicity By Group
#### Low Dose
- IgG Titer (GMU) Mean: 20.2
- IgG Titer (GMU) SD: 6.0
- IgM Titer (GMU) Mean: 14.0
- IgM Titer (GMU) SD: 4.0
- Neutralizing Ab ID50 Mean: 40.3
- Neutralizing Ab ID50 SD: 10.0
- CD4 Response (SFC per 10^6) Mean: 64.0
- CD4 Response (SFC per 10^6) SD: 15.0
- CD8 Response (SFC per 10^6) Mean: 38.0
- CD8 Response (SFC per 10^6) SD: 11.0
- Seroconversion Percentage: 9.0

#### Mid Dose
- IgG Titer (GMU) Mean: 38.6
- IgG Titer (GMU) SD: 9.6
- IgM Titer (GMU) Mean: 20.5
- IgM Titer (GMU) SD: 6.4
- Neutralizing Ab ID50 Mean: 70.7
- Neutralizing Ab ID50 SD: 16.0
- CD4 Response (SFC per 10^6) Mean: 104.0
- CD4 Response (SFC per 10^6) SD: 24.0
- CD8 Response (SFC per 10^6) Mean: 73.0
- CD8 Response (SFC per 10^6) SD: 18.0
- Seroconversion Percentage: 16.0

#### High Dose
- IgG Titer (GMU) Mean: 51.7
- IgG Titer (GMU) SD: 13.2
- IgM Titer (GMU) Mean: 30.0
- IgM Titer (GMU) SD: 8.8
- Neutralizing Ab ID50 Mean: 91.9
- Neutralizing Ab ID50 SD: 22.0
- CD4 Response (SFC per 10^6) Mean: 134.0
- CD4 Response (SFC per 10^6) SD: 33.0
- CD8 Response (SFC per 10^6) Mean: 89.0
- CD8 Response (SFC per 10^6) SD: 24.0
- Seroconversion Percentage: 26.9

#### Placebo
- IgG Titer (GMU) Mean: 1.8
- IgG Titer (GMU) SD: 1.2
- IgM Titer (GMU) Mean: 3.8
- IgM Titer (GMU) SD: 0.8
- Neutralizing Ab ID50 Mean: 4.0
- Neutralizing Ab ID50 SD: 2.0
- CD4 Response (SFC per 10^6) Mean: 5.0
- CD4 Response (SFC per 10^6) SD: 3.0
- CD8 Response (SFC per 10^6) Mean: 3.0
- CD8 Response (SFC per 10^6) SD: 2.0
- Seroconversion Percentage: 1.9

### Injection Site Reactions
- Pain Percentage: 62.5
- Erythema Percentage: 23.4
- Swelling Percentage: 8.3
- Induration Percentage: 9.7
- Mean Pain Duration (Hours): 46.1

### Systemic Reactogenicity
- Fever Percentage: 16.8
- Fatigue Percentage: 20.1
- Myalgia Percentage: 20.3
- Headache Percentage: 16.0
- Chills Percentage: 6.3

### Safety Labs
- WBC (K) Mean: 7.5
- WBC (K) SD: 1.2
- Lymphocyte Percentage Mean: 30.5
- Lymphocyte Percentage SD: 7.3
- Neutrophil Percentage Mean: 53.9
- Neutrophil Percentage SD: 9.7
- Platelets (K) Mean: 222
- Platelets (K) SD: 43
- CRP (mg/L) Mean: 6.4
- CRP (mg/L) SD: 1.5
- Hemoglobin (g/dL) Mean: 14.1
- Hemoglobin (g/dL) SD: 0.9

### Adverse Events
- AE ID: VI-AE-0187, Description: arthralgia, Grade: 2, Relatedness: possibly related, Resolved: true, Dose Group: mid_dose
- AE ID: VI-AE-0156, Description: malaise, Grade: 1, Relatedness: possibly related, Resolved: true, Dose Group: high_dose

### Events
- Site 05 monitoring visit, 2 minor findings
- Cold chain temperature log reviewed: all within -70C +/- 5C
- Serum sample aliquoting completed for 14 subjects

### Notes
- Week 1: Immunogenicity assessments on schedule. 45 subjects enrolled across dose groups. Reactogenicity profiles consistent with prior weeks.
